name: Thor

name: Save-a-Space
content: Save-a-Space is parking personally tailored for your needs. Save-a-Space will find your parking space for you and you can instantly reserve and pay with the user‐friendly Save-a‐Space app.

name: Agricolus
content: Agricolus is a cloud platform created to simplify and enhance the work in the field of farmers and professionals. It is composed of the main applications of precision agriculture:  from satellite imagery with vegetation indices to forecast models for irrigation, fertilization, pest and diseases.

name: IDA, Index Design and Analysis
content: IDA integrates into one web platform climate modelling, ground-based and remotely sensed measures of weather variables to provide high level software capabilities for customised climate risk assessment globally, including climate index computation, visualization and reporting.

name: Artudata
content: ArtuData leverages artificial intelligence to help users find, attract, and retain their high value clients.

name: CityGO
content: CityGO is the smart urban mobility app with personalised recommendations to ease your journeys in cities.

name: Urban Data Platform (UDP)

name: MASAI

name: Ciclogreen

name: Smart irrigation
content: EGM offers a complete solution for determining the amount of water that can be saved on a green space and deploying the control solution in addition to an existing watering system to achieve the water savings in question. Our solution saved 35% of water on the first deployment.

name: Carpool parking
content: This camera allows us to count entries and exits in a carpool park and to determine whether the cars parked are indeed intended for carpooling. This device allows our clients to have tangible statistics on the occupation of a car park.

name: CuraVesta ©
content:
CuraVesta© is an assistance system, which was developed by ENGINEERING for home care. As a mHealth solution, it supports people who care and nurse their relatives at home. The system enables the caring person as well as the person in need to have access to mHealth and other health care services and comprehensive information at any time and place.
In this way, CuraVesta© enables to improve the quality and transparency of home care and to reduce the number of short-term inpatient hospital stays caused by incorrect home care and the duration of inpatient hospital stays caused by escalations.

name: Digital Enabler
content: Digital Enabler TM is the Engineering’s ecosystem platform supporting the entire value chain of data, from the discovery to the analysis, harmonization and visualization. It provides stakeholders with a single point to find, access and analyze all the data from heterogeneous data sources, deduct new information and driving in the creation of reusable dashboards and mobile applications.

name: Bustimize
content: By implementing Bustimize, a reduction of the passengers waiting time KPI and an improvement in the user satisfaction is accomplished.

name: Everimpact
content: Monitoring and Monetising Carbon Emissions for Cities.

It allows you to DESIGN your specific data models, NAVIGATE through your graphs of entities and CONTROL the interactions with the other systems.

content:
FIWOO is an IoT-Editor platform, which allows users to create any entity without the need for computer knowledge. Everything can be created without a single line of code.

Any user can create their panels, connect their devices, and generate smart rules through a simple graphic interface.

You swipe right to “like”, left to “dislike”. Foooder remembers your choices and notifies you when the liked fine food products are for sale nearby.

The company is active in EU + USA + Middle East and serves 10M+ yearly passengers / 50M€+ tickets sold.

name: WiseTown
content: WiseTown uses crowd-sourcing,  open data, IoT and social to provide decision support systems to city managers and to improve citizens' quality of life.

name: Thinking Cities
content: The Thinking Cities platform is an integral solution to support City services. It includes a series of modules that allow the acquisition, processing, storage and distribution of data, on which several City Services, vertical IoT solutions and Data Analytics can be implemented easily.

name: Telenet Tinx

name: Rosy

name: INSYLO
content: INSYLO is an affordable solution to remotely monitor livestock farms' silos and solve the million dollar question: the right moment and the right quantity to restock each silo in order to optimise logistic costs.

name: Smartlamppost
content: Smartlamppost is a modular concept of a lamppost with bleeding edge technology, allowing municipalities to future-proof their smart city and Mobile Network Operators to cost-effectively deploy their 5G solution.

name: Urban Platform
content: Our Urban Platform provides city managers and decision makers with a holistic view of their cities, presenting cross-domain data in a unified way.

name: Waste4Think

content: SMAQ is an innovative system for monitoring air quality in urban settings, created with the aim of improving air quality in cities.

name: [ui!]UrbanPulse
content: [ui!] UrbanPulse is the most efficient Open Urban Data Platform with open APIs for small and large cities, municipalities, utilities, and other organizations to reuse, repurpose, share and present new and existing urban data sources and create value-added services in real-time for your citizens.

name: [ui!]UrbanPulse
content: [ui!] UrbanPulse is an open central data platform for urban data in real-time - based on a highly scalable architecture for data processing and analysis, with a special connector framework for the integration of sensors, urban management systems and Visualization of complex data with tiles and maps.

name: Viur
content: Viur is a business intelligence solution that helps companies to unlock the value of data, through visualization and simple data exploration.

name: We4City
content: We4City is a technology solutions platform for Smart Cities, based on open standards and artificial intelligence, which provides integrated support for the Internet of Things (IoT), Real-Time Cameras, Geographic Information Systems, Virtual Assistants, Big Data and Open Data, among others. From the Smart Data Lakes concept, the solution allows cities to integrate data silos and produce the most important fuel for Smart Cities: Urban Intelligence. All this means more practicality and dynamism for society and more efficiency for public institutions.

name: Watcher
content: Watcher helps families manage the ins and outs of everyday life with ease and peace of mind.

name: WiTraC
content: WiTraC is a total wireless tracking and metering IoT solution for Industry 4.0 Supply Chain and Smart Cities.

name: YBVR
content: YerbaBuena VR delivers next generation real-time 360 live streaming distribution platform for Virtual Reality optimized for any available bandwidth.
